mcq.statement: Which two Indian allies supported Ahmad Shah Abdali in the Third Battle of Panipat?
mcq.one_liner: Ahmad Shah Abdali was supported by his two Indian allies, **Najib-ud-Daulah and Shuja-ud-Daulah**, in the Third Battle of Panipat.
